item.title: Bracu ChatApp
item.description:
Project Title: A BracuChatApp / AppForBrac

Project Features: Implemented features:

  • User to User Communication. (FireBase Backend)

  • Login system by using FireBase backend.

  • User to User File Sharing.

  • User Current Status Alike Whatâ€™s App.

  • Course Add Drop Based on Advising.

  • User with User Groups Form (Unimplemented)

Online Resources used:

  • Reference:Youtube videos: https://youtu.be/gPqJcPtN18I

  • GitHub - For FireBase - https://gist.github.com/codediodeio/6dbce1305b9556c2136492522e2100f6 For troubleshooting - https://github.com/firebase/firebase-android-sdk/issues/330

Future Enhancements: Following enhancement can be added to the current system which will improve the system.

  • UI optimization

  • Notice Board Custom Widget Functionality

  • Google Calendar Integration

  • All things Brac at One App implementation

  • Call and Video Chat
